metadata.synopsis: The party has been celebrating how they saved the tiefling refugees from the goblins. Everyone's in high spirits. The player and Shadowheart reflect a little on events and may find themselves open to flirtation. If their relationship with each other (and the absence of any other partners) allows for it, they may agree to another liaison later in the night - a bonding/romantic one.

21.speaker: Shadowheart
21.text: I already got my answer. Let's not make this awkward.

26.speaker: Shadowheart
26.text: Enjoy the rest of your night. But maybe do it elsewhere.

27.speaker: Shadowheart
27.text: Don't forget our little agreement. As soon as things quiet down here...

50.speaker: Shadowheart
50.text: We should've had wine more often. More warming than the fire.

64.speaker: Shadowheart
64.text: Best hope all this wine makes me forget what you tried to do.

113.speaker: Shadowheart
113.text: Everyone seems to be in high spirits.
113.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart and the player standing throughout, chatting in a party setting. Shadowheart has a glass of wine in hand,NodeContext: Shadowheart and the player standing throughout this dialogue, chatting in a party setting. Shadowheart has a glass of wine in hand,

52.speaker: Shadowheart
52.text: Strange... you know who I never thought I'd find myself caring for?

70.speaker: Shadowheart
70.text: Exactly right. Never gave them much thought. Certainly not that bunch in the grove.

33.speaker: Shadowheart
33.text: Your words, not mine. But not what I mean.

13.speaker: Shadowheart
13.text: I wouldn't quite say that... but no, that's not what I mean.

121.speaker: Shadowheart
121.text: I mean desperate people... like those refugees. Never gave them much thought. Certainly not that bunch in the grove.

60.speaker: Shadowheart
60.text: Yet we came through for them. We saved their lives. Odd.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: Not so odd. We did the right thing.

80.speaker: Shadowheart
80.text: That's more easily said by some than others.

103.speaker: Player
103.text: Are you worried Shar won't approve?

9.speaker: Shadowheart
9.text: Something like that. I was taught to reject anything that distracted from Shar...
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart looks the player up and down.

34.speaker: Shadowheart
34.text: ...but there'll be time for penance later.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Don't get used to it. We just needed to clear the path forward.

41.speaker: Shadowheart
41.text: How pragmatic. One would think letting the goblins torch the grove would have resulted in the same.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: But nobody's here to debate right from wrong.

69.speaker: Shadowheart
69.context: NodeContext: She's trying to make this sound nonchalant, but isn't quite succeeding

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: I won't keep you long - I gather you've already made plans with someone for your evening.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Places her glass down to top it up, reaching for a nearby wine bottle.NodeContext: The player's already spoken for and SH will respect that. Places her glass down to top it up, reaching for a nearby wine bottle.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Maybe those plans could change, for the right person...

82.speaker: Narrator
82.text: *Shadowheart says nothing, but the glimmer of interest in her eyes is unmistakable.*
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gives a bold 'I'm up for it if you are' look.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: I'll find you later, once the camp's asleep.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: I don't suppose you'd consider some sort of shared arrangement?

66.speaker: Player
66.text: On second thought, perhaps not. I should honour my other arrangement.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: I've arranged some... company, yes. It could be a long evening.

11.speaker: Shadowheart
11.text: There - some liquid courage. And try to get some rest too if you can; tomorrow's another day.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pours a second glass of wine for the player and hands it over.NodeContext: A little playful and suggestive. She knows the player's got a liaison with someone else planned for later in the night

114.speaker: Shadowheart
114.text: We should wait a little while. Until the others have drifted off.

90.speaker: Player
90.text: I'll find you after everyone's turned in for the night.

30.speaker: Shadowheart
30.text: Best not keep me waiting. I'd prefer not to entertain myself...
30.context: NodeContext: Just a hint of playfulness. Fully aware of the innuendo but largely playing it straight and letting the player's mind do the rest.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: Not keen on sharing with the others?

100.speaker: Shadowheart
100.text: As you like. Try not to tire yourself out too much.

39.speaker: Shadowheart
39.text: Just a bottle. I think you have other plans afterwards - wouldn't want to keep you.
39.context: NodeContext: The player's already spoken for and SH will respect that.

49.speaker: Shadowheart
49.text: ...Well, maybe I would. But first come, first served.
49.context: NodeContext: A little suggestive. Make the player feel like they've missed out.

32.speaker: Shadowheart
32.text: It's quite a bottle. I liberated one of the finer vintages earlier.

16.speaker: Shadowheart
16.text: Best enjoyed someplace private, I think.

56.speaker: Shadowheart
56.text: I thought you might've wanted to mingle with the others.
56.context: NodeContext: A little surpised. She thought the player would have had enough of her company by now.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Are you trying to get rid of me?

106.speaker: Shadowheart
106.text: No, but I thought you might be keen to get away from me. We haven't always seen eye to eye, after all.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: There'll be time for that later.

8.speaker: Shadowheart
8.text: True. But I thought you might not want to linger with me. We haven't always seen eye to eye, after all.

63.speaker: Shadowheart
63.text: Besides, I'm sure there's plenty of people who'll be keen to celebrate most thoroughly with you.
63.context: NodeContext: A little cheeky and knowing. She knows the player will likely be very popular at the party.

71.speaker: Shadowheart
71.text: I mean you saved the grove. I'm sure you'll find you're quite popular, if you look around.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: You sure about that? Maybe they dislike me as much as you do.

12.speaker: Shadowheart
12.text: You're putting words in my mouth - I never said I disliked you. It's just we have some work to do, to get on each other's good sides.

81.speaker: Shadowheart
81.text: And yes, I'm sure there's someone out there for you. Gale's been stealing a glance or three in your direction...
81.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

104.speaker: Shadowheart
104.text: And yes, I'm sure there's someone out there for you. You should have seen the look Wyll was giving you earlier...
104.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

127.speaker: Shadowheart
127.text: And yes, I'm sure there's someone out there for you. I saw the way Astarion's been stealing glances at you. Hungry in more ways than usual, maybe.
127.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

86.speaker: Shadowheart
86.text: And yes, I'm sure there's someone out there for you. Lae'zel for example - I saw her looking at you a little less murderously than usual.
86.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

14.speaker: Shadowheart
14.text: And yes, I'm sure there's someone out there for you. You should go see who'd like to spend the night with the saviour of the grove...

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Maybe I'd like to celebrate with you...

19.speaker: Shadowheart
19.text: Maybe you would. But I'm not cruel enough to get your hopes up. In spite of what some might believe...

96.speaker: Player
96.text: I think I could win you over, if I wanted.

24.speaker: Shadowheart
24.text: Oh you do, do you? I'm not some dewy-eyed tiefling maiden you just saved - you'll need to do a lot more leg-work before I commit to any hip-work.

105.speaker: Player
105.text: I see. So that no is final...?

108.speaker: Shadowheart
108.text: For now. Don't worry, there'll be plenty of fun for you tonight. Just not in my tent.

120.speaker: Player
120.text: I understand. Before I go... how can we see eye to eye?

111.speaker: Shadowheart
111.text: What, some advice on how to make me more bearable? All right, if you like...

92.speaker: Shadowheart
92.text: Respect my mission, my beliefs, keep us focused on finding a cure...

23.speaker: Shadowheart
23.text: I'm not half as mysterious as you might think. Respect my privacy, my beliefs, keep us focused on finding a cure...

10.speaker: Shadowheart
10.text: If you do that, well... I see no reason why we shouldn't get closer.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: But enough about me. I saw Wyll looking at you. I bet he'd like a word, or more...
0.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

91.speaker: Shadowheart
91.text: Now enough about me. Haven't you seen the way Gale's been stealing looks at you? Go on, see if he wants something, or someone...
91.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

72.speaker: Shadowheart
72.text: Now enough about me. Did you see the way Astarion's been looking at you? Hungry in more ways than usual, maybe. Go on, you know what to do...
72.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

77.speaker: Shadowheart
77.text: Enough about me. I saw Lae'zel looking at you a little less murderously than usual. Go on, you know what to do...
77.context: NodeContext: Knowing. Giving the player a hint that one of the other party members might be interested

118.speaker: Shadowheart
118.text: Now enough about me. You should go see who'd like to spend the night with the saviour of the grove...

88.speaker: Shadowheart
88.text: I'm not half as mysterious as you might think. Respect my privacy, my opinion, keep us focused on finding a cure...

37.speaker: Player
37.text: In that case, I'll leave you to enjoy your evening.

95.speaker: Shadowheart
95.text: Have fun... and don't be a stranger.
95.context: NodeContext: Sincere on 'don't be a stranger', Door's open for future relationship development.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: You're not that bad, no. You might pretend to be that bad from time to time...

115.speaker: Shadowheart
115.text: Why I've no idea of what you mean...

116.speaker: Player
116.text: You sure about that? There's a cruel streak in you, I think.

83.speaker: Shadowheart
83.text: Keep prodding, and maybe you'll find out for certain.

48.speaker: Shadowheart
48.text: Now, on you go. And happy hunting.

129.speaker: Player
129.text: Now that you mention it... thanks for the tip. Enjoy your evening.

31.speaker: Shadowheart
31.text: I will, but not as much as you'll enjoy yours, I'm betting...

102.speaker: Player
102.text: You're all the company I need right now.

84.speaker: Shadowheart
84.text: That so? I won't pretend I'm not surprised... we haven't always seen eye to eye, after all.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: I suppose I should. Enjoy your evening.

110.speaker: Narrator
110.text: *Shadowheart trails off and glances around at the party. She turns back to you, mildly surprised you're still there.*

85.speaker: Shadowheart
85.text: I'd rather enjoy this wine on my own, so... find your entertainment elsewhere?

74.speaker: Player
74.text: Sounds like the wine is talking.

123.speaker: Shadowheart
123.text: It's not talking enough for my liking.
123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Holding up her glass and considering its contents in a playful critique.NodeContext: 'Wish I had something stronger'. Holding up her glass and considering its contents in a playful critique.

65.speaker: Shadowheart
65.text: I think you'll find I've been showing ample concern for myself since the moment we met.

53.speaker: Shadowheart
53.text: Desperate people... refugees. Never gave them much thought. Certainly not that bunch in the grove.

51.speaker: Shadowheart
51.text: I saw you with Astarion. You two looked... cosy.

75.speaker: Shadowheart
75.text: I saw you with Gale. You two looked... cosy.

68.speaker: Shadowheart
68.text: I saw you with Karlach. You two looked... cosy.

112.speaker: Shadowheart
112.text: I saw you with Lae'zel. You two looked... cosy.

18.speaker: Shadowheart
18.text: I saw you with Wyll. You two looked... cosy.

17.speaker: Shadowheart
17.text: Far be it from me to judge. Blood must still be running a little hot after everything.
